title: Sen. Bernie Sanders | Trump Keeps Lying About Hurricane Dorian and Alabama: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump defending his doctored map showing Hurricane Dorian hitting Alabama.

Then, he talks to Democratic presidential hopeful Senator Bernie Sanders.
